result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeremy L Wilson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant's probation revoked - sentenced to county jail/hoc on 9-8-15; unpaid court obligations of $267 and supervision fees of $80
Amended Revocation Summary filed - faxed today from agent

Cases called: 14CF290 & 14CF354, Defendant Jeremy L Wilson in court, in custody with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Amended Revocation Summaries reviewed. Sentencing statements by ADA Cross and Atty. Riek. Court sentenced defendant in 14CF290 to 3 months jail commence forth with.  Huber granted under jail rules. May transfer to Sauk County Jail.  In 14CF354, 3 months jail on each count. Counts run consecutive to each other and consecutive to 14CF290. Court granted 42 days jail credit in 14CF290. Court granted 111 days jail credit in 14CF354. Civil judgment entered in 14CF290 to $267 and in 14CF354 to $848.
Amended revocation summary filed by fax from DOC.
Sentencing hearing on revocation at 09-08-2015 09:30 am

Cases heard: 14CF174, 14CF354 & 14CF290, Defendant Jeremy L Wilson in court with attorney Mark D. Lawton.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amended Complaints filed; readings waived. Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant plead no contest to count 2&3 in 14CF174, ct. 1 in 14CF290, ct. 1&2 in 14CF354. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment. Court sentenced defendant in 14CF174 on ct. 2 to 60 days jail, huber granted. On ct. 3 to 120 day jail, huber granted, start 12/11/14 at 7 p.m., may transfer to Sauk County Jail. Counts run concurrent with each other. $443 costs on each count. (19 days jail credit)  In 14CF290 & 14CF354, Court withheld sentenced, placed defendant on 2 yr. probation, Conds: Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations, no possession/consumption of alcohol. $443 costs on each count. (42 days jail credit in 14CF290 & 26 days credit in 14CF354) Cash bond applied to costs. Ct. 1 in 14CF174 dismissed.
plea/sentencing hearing on December 2, 2014 at 10:00 a.m.

Defendant Jeremy L Wilson in court with attorney Mark D Lawton.  Brenda L Yaskal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is not resolved.  Atty Lawton asked for a preliminary hearing to be set.  Bond remains.  Defendant continues to waive time limits.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 26, 2014 at 09:00 am.
